text: Wine Cellars (Spanish:La bodega) is a 1930 French-Spanish film directed by Benito Perojo and starring Colette Darfeuil, Valentín Parera and Enrique Rivero. It was originally made as a silent film, with sound added later. Based on the film's reputation, Perojo was invited to Hollywood to make Spanish- language films for the major studios.Bentley p.51 ==Cast== * María Luz Callejo * Joaquín Carrasco * Jean Coste as Pablo Dupont * Régina Dalthy * Colette Darfeuil as La Marquesita * Gabriel Gabrio as Fermin * Madame Guillaume * Valentín Parera as Don Luis * Concha Piquer as Maria Luz * Enrique Rivero as Raphaël == References == ==Bibliography== * Bentley, Bernard.
